newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian share trade falls further, prices mixed.
newsitem.headline: Latvian share trade falls further, prices mixed.

text.p: Trade on the Latvian stock exchange continued to diminish on Monday while share prices were mixed, dealers said.
Total turnover almost halved to 87,000 lats from 157,000 lats on Friday and Rietumu Bank's Rietumu16 index slipped by 0.26 percent to 230.21.
Market leader Unibanka rose one santime to five lats and was the most traded stock on 29,600 lats.
Secondary market stock Lode Brick was the biggest riser, leaping by 14.29 percent to 2.35 lats on low trade of 2,100 lats.
Riga Transport Fleet, also on the official list, saw turnover of 9,800 lats but was stable at 1.70 lats.
Valmiera Glassfibre on the secondary list was well traded at 10,200 lats but slipped to 2.16 lats from 2.20 lats.
Other active shares included Liepaja fish cannery which rose 10 santimes to 1.50 lats on 10,800 lat volume while Daugavpils Chain lost three santimes to 2.80 lats on 10,200 lats.
